subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: This season, receiver Amani Toomer has been overshadowed by Plaxico Burress. But Toomer’s role as an elder statesman on the Giants has not been eclipsed.
snippet: This season, receiver Amani Toomer has been overshadowed by Plaxico Burress. But Toomer’s role as an elder statesman on the Giants has not been eclipsed.
